column4: marabout; if it is broken.. how is it suppose to read the cd?
I am referring to copying the iso onto the hard drive to get it to run off of the hard drive

the machine in question (emachine 600ix) cannot boot from the USB. someone mentioned getting Ubuntu onto a hard drive and then just putting that HD into the machine. I am unclear if it needs to be actually 'installed' on the HD or can it be the disc image, e.g.  the iso
what do you know about via a floppy disc. if I could just get something on there I imagine I can then download via the internet....
